title: DDI organization schema
description: JSON-schema representing an organization in the DDI model. Legal or physical entity corresponding to a business or administration.

name.description: a property to specify the name of the organization

abbreviation.description: a property to specify the shortname, abbreviation associated to the organization

postalAddress.description: a property to specify the postal, street address associated to an organization

role.description: A property that identifies the role of the organization (ideally from a controlled vocabulary/ontology)
